testcase.name: Prouser Submit a Claim as passenger in bus
testcase.system-out: Given prouser logins into whiplash application..............................passed When prouser enter all mandatory details for claim creation as 'A passenger on a bus' and 'NO' and 'NO'.passed Then claim is created for prouser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator receives claim and claim liability sent to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is sent to the compensator.....................................passed When compensator receives claim and send to TPA.............................passed Then claims acceptance and liability decision is now sent to TPA............passed

testcase.name: TPA accepts full liability
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When TPA accepts full liability.............................................passed Then claims acceptance and liability information is passed to claimant......passed

testcase.name: Prouser uploads medical report
testcase.system-out: Given upload medical report is enabled for 'prouser'........................passed And 'prouser' adds fee......................................................passed When claimant uploads medical report at 'Pending-Medical'...................passed Then medical report is uploaded and offer request is sent to compensator....passed

testcase.name: TPA makes First Offer with fee proposal
testcase.system-out: Given claimant requests offer to TPA........................................passed When the TPA makes first offer with fee proposal............................passed Then claim offer is sent to claimant review.................................passed

testcase.name: TPA withdraws the first offer
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When TPA withdraws the offer at claim 'Pending-ReviewOffer'.................passed Then TPA gets an option to replace the offer................................passed

testcase.name: TPA replace offer
testcase.system-out: Given TPA has withdrawn the first offer.....................................passed When replacement offer is made to claimant..................................passed Then claim will be sent for claimant acknowledgement........................passed

testcase.name: Prouser rejects the first offer to Compensator
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives the offer..........................................passed When 'prouser' reject the offer.............................................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision and SLA is breached.................passed

testcase.name: Prouser withdraw the offer and replaces with new offer
testcase.system-out: Given Prouser has rejected offer to TPA.....................................passed Then Prouser withdraw the offer and replace with new offer..................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: TPA accepts prouser counter offer
testcase.system-out: Given claimant request interm payment to TPA................................passed When TPA accepts claimant counter offer.....................................passed Then claim is sent to claimant..............................................passed

testcase.name: Prouser accepts Fee
testcase.system-out: Given prouser review fee proposal...........................................passed When 'prouser' accepts revised offer........................................passed Then Acknowledgement will be sent to compensator............................passed

testcase.name: Claimant goes to court for fees non-payment
testcase.system-out: Given SLA is breached for non-payment.......................................passed When prouser decides to go to court for fee settlement pending..............passed Then claim sent to compensator for reviewing documents selected.............passed

testcase.name: TPA acknowledges documents selected for court
testcase.system-out: Given claimant selects court documents TPA..................................passed When TPA agrees to court documents when claim is in 'Pending-FeesListReview'.passed Then claim is sent to claimant..............................................passed

testcase.name: prouser Claimant acknowledges Compensators doc selection and case is resolved
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' checks the documents uploaded by Compensator................passed When 'prouser' submit the claim for court with claim 'Pending-FeesListAccept'.passed Then case is closed at court stage..........................................passed

testcase.name: The claim is moved to 'Resolved-NonPayment'
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' goes to court...............................................passed When prouser claim goes to dispute at court at 'Resolved-NonPayment'........passed Then the claim will be resolved at court....................................passed
